fr.nantes.alarm

Interface AlarmClock

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicAlarmClock

    public interface AlarmClock
    Common interface for simple alarm clocks. Client can choose a ringtone and the alarm time (hour and minutes). The alarm clock must be activated every day to ring at the expected hour. That is, once the alarm clock rings, it becomes inactive. Created on 16/11/2017. Initial code form Arnaud Lanoix and Jean-Marie Mottu

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void activate()
      Activates or disables (makes inactive) this Alarm Clock.
      void addMin(int minutes)
      Increments the ringing time with the number of minutes passed as parameter.
      int getHour()
      Accessor to this alarm hour.
      int getMin()
      Accessor to this alarm's minutes.
      int getRing()
      Accessor to this alarm ringtone.
      boolean isActive()
      Accessor for the current status of this alarm, if it is enabled or not.
      boolean isRinging()
      Returns the current state of this alarm.
      void selectRing(int ringtone)
      Selects a new ringtone, if and only if this alarm clock is not ringing.
      void switchOff(boolean snooze)
      Switches off (stops) this alarm clock ring.

    • Method Detail

      • selectRing

        void selectRing(@Nonnegative
                int ringtone)
         throws AlarmClockException
        Selects a new ringtone, if and only if this alarm clock is not ringing.
        Parameters:
        ringtone - the ringtone, between 1 and 10.
        Throws:
        AlarmClockException - when the ringtone is invalid or when the alarm clock is ringing

      • addMin

        void addMin(@Nonnegative
            int minutes)
     throws AlarmClockException
        Increments the ringing time with the number of minutes passed as parameter. As a result, it changes the Hour and the Minutes previsously stored.
        Parameters:
        minutes - the increment, in minutes.
        Throws:
        AlarmClockException - if the parameter is invalid.

      • activate

        void activate()
        Activates or disables (makes inactive) this Alarm Clock. The Alarm Clock only rings if it is active.

      • switchOff

        void switchOff(boolean snooze)
        throws AlarmClockException
        Switches off (stops) this alarm clock ring. If the parameter snooze is true, makes it active again and rings back after 5 minutes.
        Parameters:
        snooze - when true, makes the alarm clock ring again, 5 minutes later.
        Throws:
        AlarmClockException - if the alarm cannot be snoozed.

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()
        Accessor for the current status of this alarm, if it is enabled or not.
        Returns:
        a boolean value: true if the alarm is enabled, false otherwise.

      • isRinging

        boolean isRinging()
        Returns the current state of this alarm.
        Returns:
        a boolean value: true if the alarm is ringing, false otherwise.

      • getRing

        @Nonnegative
int getRing()
        Accessor to this alarm ringtone.
        Returns:
        an int value between 1 and 10.

      • getHour

        @Nonnegative
int getHour()
        Accessor to this alarm hour.
        Returns:
        an int value between 0 and 23.

      • getMin

        @Nonnegative
int getMin()
        Accessor to this alarm's minutes.
        Returns:
        an int value between 0 and 59.
